LogLevel.description: Only show alerts for this log-level.  Can be: `error`, `warning`, `notice`, or `debug`.

StartDate.description: Only include alerts that occurred on or after this date and time. Specify the date and time in GMT and format as `YYYY-MM-DD` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`. Queries for alerts older than 30 days are not supported.

EndDate.description: Only include alerts that occurred on or before this date and time. Specify the date and time in GMT and format as `YYYY-MM-DD` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`. Queries for alerts older than 30 days are not supported.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
